docs.text: Workshop When Data Engineering Mondays 2-3pm (Jan 29 - Mar 25) Intro to Graph Machine Learning Mondays 2-3pm (Apr 01 - Apr 29) NextGen Geospatial Data Science Tuesdays 2-3pm Intro to Data Science Tuesdays 3-4pm Data Science Tapas Wednesdays 1-2pm Office Hours Mondays 3-4pm, Wednesdays 2-3pm Classical Machine Learning Thursdays 2-3pm Intro to Deep Learning Thursdays 3-4pm
